pages.text:
[Page Title: Ruby Slipper & Ruby Sunshine | Brunch Born in New OrleansRuby BrunchRuby Brunch Footer - Desktop and Mobile]

MENUS 
Sweet, Savory, or Syrupy
—whatever you're craving, we've got it. Dive into our menu, where it’s all about one thing: Brunch. View More 
BELIEVE IN BETTER BISCUITS
Our legendary biscuits are crafted from scratch and baked fresh all day, every day. Fun Fact: we serve over 40,000 biscuits a week!  And the best part?  These buttery clouds of goodness come with our signature house-made cane-syrup butter. Catering You bring the people.  We’ll bring the mimosas. INQUIRE NOW

[Page Title: MENUS - Ruby Slipper & Ruby SunshineRuby BrunchRuby Brunch Footer - Desktop and Mobile]

Menu Seasonal Specials Dietary Preference Ruby’s Doggone Good Menu Menu 
Starters

BEIGNETS

Fresh handmade New Orleans-style beignets covered with powdered sugar (6 per order)

FRIED GREEN TOMATOES

Fried green tomatoes topped with lettuce, remoulade, red tomatoes and bacon-onion jam

LOADED TOTS

Tots topped with apple-braised pork debris, pork tasso cream sauce and chives Add bacon

PIG-CANDY BACON BITES

Applewood-smoked bacon bites with candy glaze

FRENCH TOAST BITES

Brioche French toast bites, fried and tossed in cinnamon sugar and served with cream cheese icing & praline sauce

Specialties

Made Fresh from Scratch

BISCUITS & GRAVY*

Buttermilk biscuits covered in country sausage gravy served with two eggs any style, and Applewood-smoked bacon

+ Add fried chicken, original or sweet heat-style

+Add fried green tomato

COSTA RICAN BREAKFAST

Two eggs any style, spicy chorizo sausage, slow-cooked black beans & Rice, topped with warm tomato salsa crispy plantains, and avocado

MIGAS

A Tex-Mex egg scramble with pico de gallo, spicy chorizo sausage over crispy tortilla strips, topped with chipotle sour cream, pico de gallo, pepper jack, and cilantro served with a side of avocado

Make it Skinny… Tex-Mex egg white scramble with pico de gallo and spinach

+Add shrimp

SHRIMP & GRITS

Gulf shrimp sautéed with pork tasso, bell pepper, red onion, beer & rosemary-butter reduction, over creamy stone-ground grits served with a buttermilk biscuit

SWEET HEAT CHICKEN & FRENCH TOAST BITES

Fried chicken and fresh strawberries tossed in hot honey glaze over French toast bites

THE TRIFECTA*

“Taste of Ruby” featuring our signature egg benedicts: Cochon, Chicken St. Charles and Bayou Shrimp

Pancakes

Served with applewood-smoked bacon

WHITE CHOCOLATE BREAD PUDDING PANCAKES

Filled with white chocolate bread pudding and cinnamon sugar topped with white chocolate whiskey sauce

CINNAMON SWIRL PANCAKES

Filled with cinnamon & sugar and topped with cream cheese icing

CLASSIC BUTTERMILK PANCAKES

With cane syrup butter

Sandwiches

CLASSIC BREAKFAST SANDWICH*

Applewood-smoked bacon, scrambled egg, and cheddar served on your choice of brioche bun or buttermilk biscuit with a side of breakfast potatoes. Protein sub by request

RUBY FRIED CHICKEN SANDWICH

Crispy fried chicken, housemade roasted red pepper aioli, and pickles on a brioche bun, served with fries. Fried Chicken tossed in hot honey glaze
Try It Sweet Heat-Style! 
HOT HONEY CHICKEN BISCUIT

Crispy fried chicken tossed in hot honey glaze on a buttermilk biscuit, served with breakfast potatoes

SOUTHERN BLT

Fried green & fresh red tomato, Applewood-smoked bacon, lettuce and mayo on toast, served with fries

SMASHBURGER*

Two smashed beef patties with cheddar, red onion, lettuce, tomato, pickles, bacon-onion jam, and mayo on a brioche bun, served with fries

Ruby Refreshers

RUBY COLADA

Natalie’s Beet Orange Juice, cream of coconut, pineapple and fresh lime juice

SPARKLING SUNRISE

Ritual Zero Proof Tequila, muddled fresh strawberries & Crofter’s strawberry preserves with fresh lime juice, Natalie’s Blood Orange Juice, and San Pellegrino Sparkling Limonata

Coffee & Beverages

Our smooth Signature Breakfast Blend is crafted exclusively for you and the Ruby Krewe by our friends at French Truck Coffee.

CREAMY VANILLA ICED COFFEE

French Truck cold brew coffee, vanilla syrup, milk and cream topped with whipped cream and nutmeg

CREAMY VANILLA SPICED LATTE

French Truck espresso, vanilla syrup, milk and cream topped with whipped cream and nutmeg

NOLA-STYLE ICED COFFEE

French Truck cold brew coffee, milk & cream

HOT COFFEE

LATTE, CAPPUCINO OR ESPRESSO

HOT CHOCOLATE OR HOT TEA

JUICE (ORANGE, CRANBERRY, PINEAPPLE OR APPLE)

MILK, CHOCOLATE MILK

ICED TEA (SWEET OR UNSWEETENED)

LEMONADE

SODA

PERRIER SPARKLING WATER

ACQUA PANNA STILL WATER
*These items may be cooked to order. Consuming raw or undercooked meats, poultry, seafood, shellfish or eggs may increase your risk of foodborne illness, especially if you have certain medical conditions. Food prepared in our kitchen may contain or come in contact with peanuts, tree nuts, soybeans, milk, wheat, fish and shellfish. Please let your server know if you have a food allergy or restriction. Ruby Slipper Restaurant Group 
Bennies

CHICKEN ST. CHARLES*

Fried chicken breast served over a buttermilk biscuit, topped with two poached eggs, finished with a pork tasso cream sauce

EGGS COCHON*

Slow-cooked, apple-braised pork served over a buttermilk biscuit, topped with two poached eggs, finished with hollandaise

EGGS BLACKSTONE “THE O.G”*

Applewood-smoked bacon and grilled tomato served over a buttermilk biscuit, topped with two poached eggs, finished with hollandaise, served with a side salad

BAYOU SHRIMP*

Gulf shrimp sautéed with pork tasso and Creole tomato sauce served over two poached eggs, fried green tomatoes and a buttermilk biscuit

ONE TOMATO, TWO TOMATO*

Fried green tomato and grilled red tomato served over a buttermilk biscuit, topped with two poached eggs and hollandaise, served with a side salad

THE PEACEMAKER*

CAN’T DECIDE? MIX ANY TWO of our Benedicts and get the best of both worlds. Harmony on a plate!

French Toast

Served with applewood-smoked bacon

CLASSIC FRENCH TOAST

Brioche French toast topped with fresh strawberries and cane syrup butter

FRENCH TOAST BITES

Brioche French toast bites, fried and tossed in cinnamon sugar and served with cream cheese icing & praline sauce

BANANAS FOSTER FRENCH TOAST

New Orleans-style French toast with rum-flambéed bananas and raisins served with Applewood-smoked bacon

BERRY CHANTILLY STUFFED FRENCH TOAST

Brioche French toast stuffed with almond cheesecake, topped with Chantilly cream, blueberry compote, and macerated strawberries

Eggs & Omelets

SOUTHERN BREAKFAST

Two eggs any style, stone-ground grits, Applewood-smoked bacon, fried green tomato with a buttermilk biscuit

GULF SHRIMP OMELET*

Gulf shrimp, red onion, bell pepper, and cheddar cheese served with creamy stone-ground grits and a buttermilk biscuit

BREAKFAST TACOS (VEG)

Three grilled flour tortillas filled with a scramble of eggs, pico de gallo, pepper jack, chipotle sour cream, and avocado, served with a side of breakfast potatoesChorizo, Applewood-Smoked Bacon, Ham, Pork Sausage, Chicken Sausage, Shrimp
Add Meat 
THREE LITTLE PIGS OMELET*

Applewood-smoked bacon, ham, and sausage with Swiss cheese served with grits and a buttermilk biscuit

FLORENTINE OMELET*

Portobello mushroom, spinach & goat cheese served with a side salad and a buttermilk biscuit

egg whites, spinach, mushrooms, and goat cheese
Make It Skinny… 
SPANISH OMELET*

Chorizo sausage, pico de gallo and pepper jack cheese served with grits and a buttermilk biscuit

B.Y.O. OMELET

Served with creamy stone-ground grits and a buttermilk biscuitCheddar, Swiss, Pepper Jack or Goat CheeseOnion, Tomato, Spinach, Mushrooms, Bell Peppers, Applewood-Smoked Bacon, Ham, Pork Sausage, Chicken Sausage, Chorizo, ShrimpPico De Gallo, Tasso Cream Sauce, Hollandaise
Choose Your Cheese: Add up to 3: Sauce it up: 
Lighter Fare

AVOCADO TOAST*

Multigrain toast points topped with a poached egg, herbed creme fraiche, pickled red onions, flash-fried capers and chives

SKINNY FLORENTINE OMELET *

Egg whites, portobello mushroom, spinach and goat cheese, served with a side salad and a buttermilk biscuit

SKINNY MIGAS

A Tex-Mex egg white scramble with pico de gallo, and spinach, served with a side of avocado

COBB SALAD

Mixed greens topped with fried chicken breast, pepper jack, sliced red onion, cherry tomatoes, avocado, candied bacon, and hardboiled egg, served with green goddess dressing

On the Side

APPLEWOOD-SMOKED BACON, PORK SAUSAGE LINKS, CHICKEN SAUSAGE PATTIES, CHORIZO SAUSAGE

STONE-GROUND GRITS, BREAKFAST POTATOES, TATER TOTS, FRENCH FRIES

BUTTERMILK BISCUIT OR TOAST served with butter or Crofter’s Preserves

SEASONAL FRESH FRUIT

SIDE SALAD served with Champagne Vinaigrette

ONE EGG* (ANY STYLE)

CLASSIC BUTTERMILK PANCAKE

Eye Opening Cocktails

RUBY MIMOSA

A generous pour of our sparkling wine, OJ and a splash of pomegranate juice

BIG EASY MIMOSA

A generous pour of our sparkling wine and choice of juice or house purée (grapefruit, cranberry, pineapple, blood orange, or seasonal)

AWARD-WINNING BLOODY MARY

Our spicy housemade mix paired with Fris vodka or Pueblo Viejo 100% agave tequila

BACON BLOODY MARY

Our spicy housemade mix with Applewood-smoked bacon infused Fris vodka

MORNING MARGARITA

Pueblo Viejo 100% agave tequila, fresh seasonal juice, triple sec and lime

PEACH BELINI

A generous pour of our sparkling wine with housemade peach purée and peach schnapps

LAVENDER PALOMA

Pueblo Viejo 100% agave tequila with lavender syrup, fresh lime juice, and grapefruit Perrier

HELLO SUNSHINE

Miles’ Gin, grapefruit juice, and rosemary simple syrup

SAZERAC SIPPER

Sazerac Rye Whiskey, Peychaud’s Bitters, rosemary simple syrup and ginger ale in an Herbsaint-coated glass, garnished with a rosemary sprig

IRISH COFFEE

A blend of Ryan’s Irish cream and Paddy’s Irish whiskey with French Truck coffee served hot or iced

BOOZY ICED COFFEE

Fris vodka, cold-brewed French Truck coffee, milk & cream, vanilla syrup, and whipped cream

BOURBON MILK PUNCH

Benchmark bourbon with milk, cream, vanilla syrup, and nutmeg

Consuming raw or undercooked meats, poultry, seafood, shellfish or eggs may increase your risk of foodborne illness, especially if you have certain medical conditions. Food prepared in our kitchen may contain or come in contact with peanuts, tree nuts, soybeans, milk, wheat, fish and shellfish. Please let your server know if you have a food allergy or restriction. Ruby Slipper Restaurant Group Seasonal Specials 
Seasonal Specials

KING CAKE BEIGNETS

New Orleans-style beignets topped with almond cheesecake, blueberry compote, lemon curd, whipped cream and Mardi Gras sugar crystals.

OOH-BAE STUFFED FRENCH TOAST

Brioche French toast stuffed with ube cheesecake, topped with lemon curd, passion fruit popping boba and whipped cream.

KREWE-BERRY MARGARITA
Pueblo Viejo 100% Blanco tequila and triple sec blended with macerated blueberries, fresh blueberry juice and house sour mix, finished with a Mardi Gras sugar salt rim. Dietary Preference If you have a specific food allergy that could cause a medical reaction, we kindly ask that you inform your server before placing your order. Our team will work with you to help identify options that best meet your needs. This includes, but is not limited to, soy allergies. While we offer keto-friendly, vegetarian, vegan, and gluten-free options, please note that there is always a risk of cross-contact when preparing dishes in our kitchens. Many of our menu items may contain ingredients that were prepared in facilities that process or package nuts. As such, we are unable to guarantee 100% nut-free options. DOWNLOAD PDF Ruby’s Doggone Good Menu 
Ruby's Doggone Good Menu

SHAGGY’S SCRAMBLE

HOWL-LE-LU-JAH, the dog days are over!!! No need to beg for a piece of mommy’s omelet. Rollover and enjoy two eggs, cheddar cheese, and butter scrambled in with dices of green peppers and chicken sausage.

BERRY GOOD BOY PUPCAKES

Who has time to chase squirrels when pupcakes are unleashed? Your pup will sit and stay for our pet friendly pancakes topped with fresh strawberries and banana. It’s not just a treat; it’s the beagles-knees!

RUBY PUPPYCCINO

Not your average puppyccino! Your canine connoisseur will lap up the lagniappe and drool over the decadent combo of tasty, whipped cream, savory bacon, and fresh juicy blueberries. According to official research, it is as satisfying as a belly rub!

Available only at the following Ruby Slipper and Ruby Sunshine locations:

Franklin, TN, Brook Highland, AL, Charleston Downtown, SC, South End Charleston, SC, Baton Rouge, LA, Veterans Metairie, LA, Mid-City New Orleans, LA, Mobile, AL, Baytowne Miramar Beach, FL
Menu items and pricing may vary by location
